s_title: Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The
s_synopsis: "The Twisted Tales of Spike McFang" is an action-rpg starring the titular hero, a young vampire prince who must rescue his parents and save the inhabitants of the Vladamasco Islands from the evil Von Hesler. But is it really his handiwork, or is there someone else controlling him? Unravel the mystery while traveling to various locales, fighting Von Hesler's henchmen and picking up CPU-controlled companions along the way.
